messages.subject: Cartoon Book Recommendation
messages.msgSnippet: We recently checked a book out of the library called Little Lit that my son is loving! It s a collection of fairy tales done comic book-style by 17 different
messages.messageBody:
We recently checked a book out of the library called Little Lit that my son
is loving! It's a collection of fairy tales done comic book-style by 17
different cartoon artists from around the world. Very cool. We are enjoying comparing
the styles of the different artists and the twists that they put on the fairy
tales.
Amy
Amy Kagey
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">Free shipping on </A><A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">Usborne Books</A> !



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
